pages.text: When you cross a missile truck with a military ship, you get Pyrrhus. It carries a VLS with 6 missile cells and two large missile batteries containing 5 missiles each, for a grand total of 16 missiles loaded at any time. With this much firepower, it can take on any opponent no matter how far away they are.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/missile)$(l)Missile/$$(br)Pyrrhus fires one of its missiles, $(l)dealing 2 damage to the target tile/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)8 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/retaliation)$(l)Missile Barrage/$$(br)$(l)Upon being destroyed/$, Pyrrhus fully empties both missile batteries, $(l)dealing 3 damage to a random opponent ship/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
